name: SENTINEL2_L1C
title: Sentinel-2 L1C
description: SENTINEL-2 is a wide-swath, high-resolution, multi-spectral imaging mission, supporting Copernicus Land Monitoring studies, including the monitoring of vegetation, soil and water cover, as well as observation of inland waterways and coastal areas. The SENTINEL-2 Multispectral Instrument (MSI) samples 13 spectral bands: four bands at 10 metres, six bands at 20 metres and three bands at 60 metres spatial resolution.

name: SENTINEL2_L2A
title: Sentinel-2 L2A
description:
SENTINEL-2 is a wide-swath, high-resolution, multi-spectral imaging mission, supporting Copernicus Land Monitoring studies, including the monitoring of vegetation, soil and water cover, as well as observation of inland waterways and coastal areas. The SENTINEL-2 Multispectral Instrument (MSI) samples 13 spectral bands: four bands at 10 metres, six bands at 20 metres and three bands at 60 metres spatial resolution.
 The level 2A data is atmospherically corrected using Sen2Cor.

name: SENTINEL1_GRD
title: Sentinel-1 SAR GRD: C-band Synthetic Aperture Radar Ground Range Detected.
description: The Sentinel-1 mission provides data from a dual-polarization C-band Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) instrument. This collection includes the S1 Ground Range Detected (GRD) scenes, processed to a calibrated, ortho-corrected product. This collection is compatible with "sar_backscatter" and "ard_normalized_radar_backscatter" processes.

name: SENTINEL1_RTC
title: Sentinel-1 RTC
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] The Sentinel-1 radiometric terrain corrected (RTC) backscatter product.

title: Landsat 8 level 2 ARD, European Coverage
description:
Landsat-8 OLI/TIRS L2SP refers to the Level-2 Surface Reflectance product acquired by the Operational Land Imager (OLI) and Thermal Infrared Sensor (TIRS) instrument on board Landsat 8 satellite. This product is derived from the Landsat-8 OLI/TIRS L1T or L1TP product and is generated using atmospheric correction algorithms to remove atmospheric effects and convert the top-of-atmosphere reflectance to surface reflectance values.

 This is Landsat 8 Collection 2 European Coverage, so does not correspond to the full Landsat archive.

providers.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center

eo:bands.name: ST_EMIS
eo:bands.description: Emissivity of Band 10 estimated from ASTER GED

title: Daily global Sentinel-3 Synergy products at 300m resolution combining OCLI and SLSTR bands.
description:
[Experimental] Sentinel-3  SYNERGY products are created from a combination of OLCI and SLSTR Level-1B products (including both
nadir and oblique views). The SYNERGY swath is then corresponding to the common area between OLCI
and SLSTR swaths, restricted to the daylight part of the SENTINEL-3 orbit (i.e., where the sun zenith angle
at satellite ground track is lower than 80°).

title: Daily global Sentinel-3 Land surface temperature at 1km resolution
description:
*Experimental* Daily global Sentinel-3 land surface temperature at 1km resolution. Land surface temperature is defined as the effective radiometric temperature of the Earth's surface "skin" in the instrument field of view. Here, "skin" is referring to the top surface in bare soil conditions and to the effective emitting temperature of vegetation "canopies" as determined from a view of the top of a canopy.
 This product is derived from the SLSTR (Sea and Land Surface Temperature Radiometer) instrument on board the Sentinel-3 satellite.

 Multiple observations may be available per day, we recommend temporal aggregation to create daily composites.

title: Global landcover at 10m resolution for 2020.
description: WorldCover provides global land cover products for 2020 at 10 m resolution, developed and validated in near-real time based on Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 data.

title: Global landcover at 10m resolution for 2021.
description: WorldCover provides global land cover products for 2020 at 10 m resolution, developed and validated in near-real time based on Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 data.
[EXPERIMENTAL] Vegetation Indices (VI) at 10m resolution.

title: Sentinel 1 Monthly Mosaics
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Sentinel-1 monthly mosaics are generated from monthly stacks of Sentinel-1 GRD data by calculating the weighted sum of the terrain corrected backscatter observations. Two different Sentinel-1 mosaics are being produced for each month: IW mosaic and DH mosaic.
[EXPERIMENTAL] The Sentinel-2 Global Mosaic 2 (S2GM-2) service is a component of the Copernicus Global Land Service providing Sentinel-2 surface reflectance time series composites.
